page.title: 17Clubs and Societies
page.content: There are six clubs in the area. They are the social club, the swimming club, the Boys Brigade, the Girls Brigade, the badminton club and the Scottish Womans Rural Institute. The social club is in the old school building and it has such facilities as a pool table, darts, piano, cards, dominoes and a bar. It is open four days a week and occasionally provides live entertainment. The Boys Brigade meets in the hall on Wednesday nights. The Girls Brigade is in the school on Wednesday nights also. The junior badminton is held in the school and the seniors play in the hall. The S.W.R.I. is held in the hall and 17 women go to it. It meets once every month.
